roleset.name: kill for belief
roleset.note: MARTYR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'martyr' based on sentences in ectb. Verbnet class orphan-29.7. Also compared with 'sacrifice'. (from martyr.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: That regime had martyred the most distinguished youngsters of this territory.
example.arg: the most distinguished youngsters of this territory

example.name: passive
example.text: Saint Valentine was martyred in the year AD 35.
